New Records: Marcus Stoinis took 4/23 in the match
Australia scored the highest powerplay score of 113/1 in the first six overs
Key Match Events: Scotland's collapse led to a 70-run loss
Pre-Game Insights: Scotland won the toss and opted to bowl first
Travis Head recorded a golden duck
Post-Match Reflections: Scotland struggled to build on their start
Miscellaneous Highlights: The series outcome allowed Australia to try out squad members
Scotland's performance in the T20 World Cup was mentioned
Others: The match was held at the Grange Cricket Club in Edinburgh
